mapper.select: SELECT ind.ID individualId, ind.FIRST_NAME firstName, ind.LAST_NAME lastName, ind.PESEL pesel, con.ID contractId, con.SIGN_DATE signingDate, pool.ID poolId, pool.EXPIRY_DATE expirationDate, pool.ALL_NUM grantedProductsCount, pool.RESERVED_NUM reservedProductsCount, pool.AVAILABLE_NUM availableProductsCount, pool.USED_NUM usedProductsCount, pool.ORDER_ID orderId, trainingInstance.ID trainingId, trainingInstance.ASSIGNED_NUM productsCount, trainingInstance.REGISTER_DATE signDate, orders.ORDER_DATE orderDate, traintCateg.NAME trainingCategoriesNames, training.NAME trainingName, training.START_DATE trainingStartDate, training.END_DATE trainingEndDate, trainingInstitution.NAME trainingInstitutionName, trainingInstanceStatus.NAME trainingStatus, trainingInstanceStatus.ID trainingStatusId FROM APP_PBE.INDIVIDUALS ind LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.CONTRACTS con ON ind.ID = con.INDIVIDUAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.PBE_PRODUCT_INSTANCE_POOLS pool ON ind.ID = pool.INDIVIDUAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.TI_TRAINING_INSTANCES trainingInstance ON ind.ID = trainingInstance.INDIVIDUAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.ORDERS orders ON pool.ORDER_ID = orders.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.CONTRACT_TRAINING_CATEGORIES contrTrainCateg ON con.ID = contrTrainCateg.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.TI_TRAINING_CATEGORIES traintCateg ON contrTrainCateg.TRAINING_CATEGORY_ID = traintCateg.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.TI_TRAININGS training ON trainingInstance.TRAINING_ID = training.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.TRAINING_INSTITUTIONS trainingInstitution ON training.TRAINING_INSTITUTION_ID = trainingInstitution.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN APP_PBE.TI_TRAINING_INSTANCE_STATUSES trainingInstanceStatus ON trainingInstance.STATUS_ID = trainingInstanceStatus.ID WHERE ind.ID = #{criteria.gryfUser.individualId}
